website_summaries.verdict: Turns any shoe into a good boot for sloshing through the snow or rain.
pros: They can be worn over hiking boots or other warm weather footwear
Easy to take on and off
cons: If your task involves actually standing in water, these boots may allow moisture in

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and useful...
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional landscape/wildlife photographer living in Maine and I've used these for two winters. They are fairly easy to put on/take off, keep my feet warm and dry even at 0 F and wet snow, and are pretty comfortable when worn over a pair of running shoes. My only complaint is that they are a bit heavy but just about all winter footware has that problem. Durability wise they seem to be standing up well.
customer_reviews.author: Bookstore Willie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Crack in seam let water in.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes had a crack in the side seam which let water in. Seam not double stitched or sealed correctly. Previous pairs have not had this. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first pair of Neos Adventurer three years ago and it leaked on my fourth trips to Banff National park. I bought my second pair for Norway and it leaked on the first day of my trip. I returned and got a new pair. Tested it at home. Some water still slowly seeping in from the edge. Checked some comments from website and concluded that the shoes are not totally waterproof. The main advantage of it is light weight. Waterproof performance is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lam Ming Hung Carl

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I work in the film industrie and these are a top need item. I stood in a creek ankle deep and these things stayed dry! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: TEST THEM THOUROUGHLY FOR LEAKS AS SOON AS YOU RECEIVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 pairs before Xmas for a June trip to Denali. Just tested them again in the bathtub and discovered that 1 of the XXL sized boots leaked like a sieve. Too late to return, so now I’m stuck with a $70 pair of “waterproof” overboots that don’t keep my feet dry. I would hope the seller would make this right.
customer_reviews.author: c g

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots, and I'm a repeat customer. My old boots, which I wore for years, are still fine and I gave them to a family member, but I graduated to a larger size. These were great for wet landings from a Zodiac in cold seas. My feet stayed warm in my hiking shoes and light wool sox. I love the fact that they are light weight and fold up fairly small. They are the perfect travel boot.
customer_reviews.author: Trekkergram

customer_reviews.title: Runs small! The Medium (Women's 9-10.5) just fits my size 9 sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: I think these overshoes will work for me. But make sure you order larger than it says. I wear a size 9 sneaker, so I bought the Medium, which says that says it's for Women's 9-10.5. I could just get my sneaker all the way down into the overboot. So if you wear a larger shoe than that, it won't fit you.
customer_reviews.author: KCM

customer_reviews.title: Sad. Tore after only one week of gentle use.
customer_reviews.text: December 12 The seam tore with gentlest tug. Was praising these to everybody I met. They are perfect and keep my feet toasty warm and dry. So, I was so disappointed when after less than one week of very careful use, they now have a finger size hole at the calf seam. It is supposed to rain tonight. I have til January 31 to return them, but probably won't, if i can cover the hole enough to stay dry. Is so frustrating. I'd never worn NEOS before and was hoping i could trust that these would last. sad.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Allison

customer_reviews.title: BEST OVERSHOE COVERS EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST OVERSHOE COVERS EVER!!! I just spent the last couple weeks working in Louisiana where it rained for days. I got stuck in tons of mud but the NEOS kept my feet/shoes completely protected! They're completely waterproof. Even after getting sloppy wet mud all over them, they kept me completely dry. They're even really easy to clean. Just hose them off and the mud comes off pretty easily. Would highly recommend them to anyone working in rain or mud! NEOS saved my shoes!
customer_reviews.author: N. Tarrab

customer_reviews.title: great product, but be sure to measure the shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: great product, but be sure to measure the shoes you will be wearing inside them. Maybe go one size bigger. Mine are really tight!
customer_reviews.author: Brian P

customer_reviews.title: Not 15” inches of water protection
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 17” boot for a canoe trip but decided to give these a try because of the light weight. Didn’t work out well. The boots slip down your pants and water also pours in through a gap under the top of the boot at the tongue. I usually had 12” or less of protection. They might be fine for other uses, but not canoeing. Getting in and out of the canoe in cold mucky water at portages was no fun. I actually gave up and just wore the underlying boots, which drained better without the NEOS.
customer_reviews.author: P. Skelly

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair
customer_reviews.text: Thank you NEOS and Amazon! Originally purchased a pair in 2014. I wear them outside over my "indoor" boots from November to April through the mud and snow around the lodge. Liked them so much, I purchased a replacement pair now that the soles are wearing through on my original overshoes. They are not for everybody but they work well for me. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: These things are great, come snow or high water. They keep my feet and legs bone dry. They're adjustable thru cinches at the ankle and calf. Undo the cinches and velcro and they come off easily enough, and go on just as easily (assuming your foot, shod or unshod, will fit inside). Along with these I got an item called STABILicers Maxx Original Heavy Duty Ice Traction Cleats for when the world ices up, which are even more amazing and fit nicely over the overboots.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous boots with some caveats. Keeps out all snow and rain, etc. Warm but not too warm. Large is good length for size ten shoe but too wide. The upper part is quite roomy for easy entry and removal but doesn't properly tighten up (not enough velcro). You can pinch yourself painfully with the clasps. Pricey.
customer_reviews.author: James Mariani

customer_reviews.title: First Test In Snow... Don't Have Good Traction.
customer_reviews.text: First Test In Snow... Don't Have Good Traction. I had ordered medium but they were too small, if your size is close to the largest on chart, order next size up. I ordered large which fit good but not very good traction and this was a small snowfall, nothing major and they seem to slip and not good traction. Hopefully I will be able to test again in snow/slippery surfaces before return period ends.
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear on winter photography outings. They are quite popular in the photography world by folks working in extreme cold and snow and after reading some rave reviews about them decided to treat myself to a pair. Today I put them on to walk across a small stream to photograph a frozen waterfall and when I got back to the car the right boot had about 5mm of water in it. The depth of the water only came over my ankle so I wasn't pushing them too hard. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: outinthesticks

customer_reviews.title: Beats regular rainboots
customer_reviews.text: I chose these because I have bad feet (plantar fasciitis) and these allow me to wear my comfortable, supportive shoes. Easy to put on and take off and seem to be high quality. Downgraded one star because of price. Otherwise highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 8clap

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots. I am a landscape photographer and often have to stand in a stream, etc to get the best shot. I bought these before I went to Iceland and used them frequently. They are super easy to put on and take off. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Carol W

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous boots
customer_reviews.text: These are the bomb. I had a pair of NEOS that were short and always filling up with snow so I got these tall ones and they are great. I keep a cozy pair of slippers in them all the time and my feet have never been cold. Wonderful for mucking about in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: nitnop

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three pairs of these boots for trips to Antarctica. I have left them as gifts for the ship’s crew. They are fabulous—easy to get on and off. I love the fact that they fit over my shoes so I know they will be comfortable and warm. Kept me warm and dry in challenging conditions.
customer_reviews.author: SCH

customer_reviews.title: I wore these while standing in a swimming pool, ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore these while standing in a swimming pool, water a couple inches over the ankles. I was in there about 5 min. To my amazement, my boots were dry when I got out. If they keep me dry submerged, they’ll keep me dry anywhere. The only downside really is that they are somewhat clunky to walk in. I wouldn’t want to wear them all day if I didn’t have to.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas schulze

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband to wear on a trip we were taking to N.C. waterfall country. I have had a pair for years and love them. My husband wears a size 8 1/2 shoe. I bought the size large. He is able to wear his Ecco hiking boots inside and they are a perfect fit. I love that they fold up and can easily go into a travel bag. I would definitely recommend these boots. Do not waste your money with cheaper versions.
customer_reviews.author: JeanT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product of quality build
customer_reviews.text: Working in the lighting crew in film production has its demands- long hours outside in all sorts of foul weather. These overboots are essential part of my kit. This pair replaces a set of Neos that lasted almost 20 years of service. I expect these to take me to retirement!
customer_reviews.author: c. strayer

customer_reviews.title: Coulda been five stars but received wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered small size and received large. Also noticed price went down $15 on Amazon the day they arrived at my door. Not amused. Husband thinks he might wear these so will keep, but disappointed I don't have my overshoes I was expecting. Great concept and easy to use. Lightweight. Very versatile looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for sport shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer needs to readjust their sizing to accomodate today's shoes. Running and walking shoes frequently have soles that flare out in the heel area. The NEOS don't have enough width for these shoes, even in the larger sizes. Too bad, because NEOS are great otherwise. I've owned them for years and they are the best. They need to increase the width of their overshoes.
customer_reviews.author: AReader

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I just got a defective pair or what, but these overshoes were NOT waterproof! I am a mail carrier and at the end of my shift on a rainy day (The very FIRST time wearing them) I literally had to POUR the mud/water out of the overshoe when I removed it. Highly unsatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Durable waterproof covering
customer_reviews.text: My husband has purchase these twice to wear over is already water proof boots and he loves these- mostly because they don’t rip or tare easily like his tingleys did -
customer_reviews.author: Kalynn

customer_reviews.title: XXL fits US Men’s Size 14 Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I just got these yesterday, and they worked great in heavy rain. This was the only boot I could find that said it would fit over a US Men’s size 14 shoe, and it fit perfectly. I purchased the XXL size, and I’m very happy with the fit and quality.
customer_reviews.author: 02 FOOL!

customer_reviews.title: If you want to stay warm and dry like I do
customer_reviews.text: There is guy at work who Cat dozers all winter trenching snow to protect the highways from drifting, he wears these. Guys I meet winter camping wear these. If you want to stay warm and dry like I do, you'll wear these this winter. I don't use them to walk miles and miles in the snow, that's what snow shoes and skis are for. But when you get where you are going, these pack down small enough so they make the trip and serve you when needed the most. They make several styles to fit most needs and conditions. I buy another pair when these wear out, someday.
customer_reviews.author: KEH

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: All my life I used the old 5 or 2 buckle boots for work in the winter, they were so heavy and they all ways flopped around when walking no matter how tight you got the buckles. Not any more, these are so light weight and with the cross strap tight, you walk around as if you are wearing only shoes. I plow snow in winter, and I worn these through some all nighters and marathon plowings and never got uncomfortable. Feet stayed warm and dry They are a little expensive but if you are looking to keep your feet warm and dry, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: DAVE H

customer_reviews.title: Order one size larger
customer_reviews.text: I. ordered the Neos 15" for myself and the Neos 11 for my wife. Neither of us have had a chance to use them yet. But I am glad that we ordered one size bigger than our normal shoes. We did so based on other reviews. Smart decision, boots fit well over our hiking boots.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Jeka

customer_reviews.title: These boots are made for sloshing
customer_reviews.text: I've worn NEOS Overshoes for years, but this is my first tall pair. They're very light, completely waterproof and go on and off in a snap. They'll stand up to whatever you throw at them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Not a fashion statement but bad@$$ non the less. I live in a city and commute on public transit most places. The last thing I want to do is lug another pair of shoes around to change into when I get to my destination. These boots solve that problem and are so light and fold up small that it is not burdensome to put in my backpack (i bought a waterproof bag to hold them in).
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: These are a replacements for the last pair which served ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a replacements for the last pair which served very well for five years up until they were damaged by stepping on a cut pipe or sharp stones . . .
customer_reviews.author: KI Time

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: be careful when ordering b/c i think they run smaller than they say. i wear an 8-1/2 steel toe boot to work & the medium barely fit. i had to stomp into them & even then it was like walking on heels b/c the back kinda bunched up under the boot. i sold 'em & got the large. perfect fit but not much wiggle room so if your boots are bigger than 8-1/2 be careful. not sure what these work like over regular shoes. somebody stole the 2nd pair & i immediately ordered these to replace them. never go to work without 'em
customer_reviews.author: david berryman

customer_reviews.title: They slip on easily and work well otherwise
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars but, unfortunately, I fall right at the beginning of the next shoe size and these are on the big side (but the size smaller is too small). I wish they made these so one of their sizes didn't cover so many shoe sizes. They slip on easily and work well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: starmika

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Keep my feet dry and they are lightweight, so my feet and legs don't get tired from wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Protection at its Finest !
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad as a gift and he wears them over his boots everyday. They are great for extra warmth and insulation not to mention keeping your boots dry and looking new protecting them from all weather conditions. I would recommend these overshoes to anyone working out in the weather ! Great value for the money !
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Call

customer_reviews.title: They are wonderful for walking my dog on trails with puddles and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have owned. The first pair wore out. They are wonderful for walking my dog on trails with puddles and wet grass up to my knees, and through snow in the winter. The best part is they go over my running shoes and I no longer get the heel blisters I get with Muck boots. I wouldn't recommend them for winter wear if your feet get cold easily and you plan on being out in the snow for long periods without snug boots on underneath, but they work very well for hour walks for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fail where the old Trekker was a win
customer_reviews.text: Construction seems fine. But they are several inches lower than the old Trekker model. This makes them useless for things like Zodiac landings. Terrible downgrade.
customer_reviews.author: J. Spiegel

customer_reviews.title: I use them for motorcycle riding in the rain.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these mainly when I'm riding my motorcycle in rain. The tread gives good grip on the wet pavement and keeps my feet nice and dry. It takes a little getting used to with the foot controls but really isn't a problem. There is no insulation so they are no warmer than my normal ride boots (just an FYI.)
customer_reviews.author: Hal Combes

customer_reviews.title: Great overshoes for bird watching in muddy situations
customer_reviews.text: I used these overshoes on a bird watching trip in the Ecuadorean Amazon. I had to put my jogging shoes inside first, then slip my feet inside them.They kept my feet dry in the mud, and with the coarse "treads" kept me from slipping in all but the wettest mud. They were light enough that I did not tire from wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, not worth $80
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the material. One pull loops tore away from the material on the second time I put them on. They are not going to last long. They are in the trunk in case I ever get caught without boots in a snowstorm, surely wouldn't hold up to daily use or even anything less than sporadic. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dubya.tm

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like them. You can't stand in water but they help keep boots dry.
customer_reviews.author: deanna

customer_reviews.title: NEOS are not the best choice for a fashion statement
customer_reviews.text: NEOS are not the best choice for a fashion statement, but if you want warm and dry feet, something that is easy to take on and off, and something that allows you to wear your comfortable summer shoes all year round, you can't beat them. They also keep mud splatters off your pant legs, allow you to splash through puddles as if you were a kid again tramp through fairly deep snow. In NH that last point is important.
customer_reviews.author: Venza Driver

customer_reviews.title: Best Overshoe.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and water resistant, very good for winter walking. I walk fifty miles each week at my job and typically get two Central New York winters out of a pair. I do treat them with silicone once or twice each winter to keep them water repellant.
customer_reviews.author: Fergus

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and keep feet dry
customer_reviews.text: These are actually very comfortable. I wear mine over my sneakers and got the extra insole you can get for warmth and comfort. I walk outside all day and these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most useful was a site which listed the inside dimensions of ...
customer_reviews.text: These overboots worked perfectly. I ordered the large mens size for an 8.5 hiking boot. Most useful was a site which listed the inside dimensions of the overboot. Otherwise, I probably would have ordered medium which would have worked for street shoes, but not hiking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: great fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I work for a delivery company...For over 10 years these have been the boots that have saved my feet from the elements..great fit and comfort...light weight so that my legs don,t get as tired from delivering packages all day....thanks...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: Well made and designed overshoe. Easy to get on and off. Nice to have the high coverage while using the snowblower. Stays dry. Good tread. Very light considering the overall size of the boot. Wore Tingley's overshoes boots for years and these are a major upgrade, especially during winter.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for maintaining a winter walking/running regime!
customer_reviews.text: First Boots I've owned that allow me to wear running shows under them. Easy to wear, light weight and excellent traction. These allow me to maintain my exercise regime in light snow conditions. With ventilated shoes these boots retain the foot heat to keep your feet warm and toasty while walking/running in the winter
customer_reviews.author: RVer Surface user

customer_reviews.title: The best overshoes you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: Have the villagers too, wanted something a little taller. Same great fit and quality. These came in handy walking the dogs during the recent heavy snows. I'm a homecare nurse and use these on my daily rounds through slush, heavy snow and icy sidewalks and steps. Always be careful on the ice. I get more complements from people that see these boots and ask where can I get some. I say Amazon and for a great price tool.
customer_reviews.author: Tim in Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Neos
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these Neos for my son and they were perfect. They keep his feet warm and dry along with his shoes that fit perfect in to the boots. I highly recommend the Neos boots.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON M WELSH

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to cover my "five fingered" toe shoes, which are in no way waterproof. I have tried them out during heavy rain and am pleased to say they work very well. I love the idea that I can also wear them over my dress shoes and even my hiking boots, if I am so inclined. Nice work!
customer_reviews.author: Jody C.

customer_reviews.title: snow boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots to replace an older (30 years) pair that finally wore out. they are the heavy duty style and should work well for moderate snow. they are not as high as my old ones ( about 4 inches shorter ) so be sure of the height when you order them. other than the height they work very well as overshoes, light weight, wear sneakers underneath, great traction.
customer_reviews.author: TIMM

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great overshoe, well made. Minimal interference with walking. Packs down. Visit the manufacturers website and double check sizing, since the external dimensions of shoes vary so much. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were the perfect answer to keep my sneakers dry and stay comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have special orthopedic inserts that only fit in my sneakers and I work outside all day in the rain. These were the perfect answer to keep my sneakers dry and stay comfortable. They are a little clunky and make some annoying "swishy" sounds when I walk.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work, keeps me dry and mud free. Really can take a beating
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gates

customer_reviews.title: Easy on, easy off.
customer_reviews.text: A good overshoe. We are a group of pheasant hunters, sons, grandsons, friends. these overshoes help us respond to the changing conditions in South Dakota. I use them at home in Iowa when we do get snow. If you are wearing safety shoes or work boots would consider a larger than recommended size.
customer_reviews.author: RRoyce

customer_reviews.title: Warm at -46 degrees F.
customer_reviews.text: Sent these to my daughter in Healy, Alaska...She's a tour guide who takes clients on sled dog trips..Her feet always got cold until she wore these...Now she says she's taking socks off because they are so warm..If they can take the cold winters of Alaska they are a good product..Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Goosey

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes them but...
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted these to wear over his dress shoes and suit pants. They work but look funny...he says he doesn't care! Honestly, he hasn't worn them as much as the weather dictated and I think it's because he has realized that they look funny with a suit. I had to return and reorder for the larger size--smaller size fit over sneakers but not dress shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nittany Lion

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great product also very warm I will definitely buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: so far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy duty as my friends pair... However, my crocs go right in to these where I leave them... they slip right on with no issues.. were a little sloppy with other shoes and took a little getting used to .. so far so good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent traction, warm, work boots fit into it.
customer_reviews.text: I need these for my steel toed work boots. Excellent traction, easy to put on and take off, stay on once they're on. Don't weld with them on, they burn. Don't ask how I know....
customer_reviews.author: Bruce K

customer_reviews.title: Wet cold is when you thank the Neos
customer_reviews.text: I am out in the elements for extended periods, these are the best protection when you know one has to trudge through slush, puddles and shallow streams. Carry them always.
customer_reviews.author: Haput

customer_reviews.title: Great product. A big advantage to wear over you ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A big advantage to wear over you favorite shoe or boot
customer_reviews.author: JAMES A HOLLOWELL

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: These overshoes are great! I am a mail carrier and this product is definitely waterproof and keeps my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: JanetW.

customer_reviews.title: They fit my lifestyle perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. As the weather in Cleveland is often unpredictable I feel I an always ready and my feet are warm and dry. I travel throughout several facilities daily so it's nice to be able to step out if these and already have on shoes. Perfect for snow shoveling and dog walks in deep snow also!
customer_reviews.author: Bdawg

customer_reviews.title: Kept me dry!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to fit over and protect a size small Bledsoe walking boot for my left foot and my prosthetic right leg. Crossed a nice wide branch with these and had no leaks. Continued to wear them for about a half mile through some fairly rough terrain with thorns and they were very comfortable. Crossed back over the branch and still no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H. T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Overshoe boot
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on over shoes and to take off. Really keeps snow and rain out
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Rain boots that kick ass!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these rain boots! They are for people who work outside, they aren’t “cute” they are work boots.
customer_reviews.author: boomchick

customer_reviews.title: Great FIlm Set Piece of Gear!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!! 100% recommend to all my friends on film and commercial sets. Way easier than rain boots and just as waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight weatherproofing
customer_reviews.text: I initially just got these to wear for bad weather cycling, but I find myself using them often in muddy wet conditions while on foot. Very comfortable to use with boots, vans, and house loafers. Strongly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Vile_Zoidberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needed a larger size.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return as they were too small. Definitely order a size up if planning to wear over any shoe more substantial than a light tennis shoe. I wear a women's size 9 and needed the Large size.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Jones

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and warm
customer_reviews.text: I wear these at work. They're very functional this pair was purchased to replace a pair from 2014.
customer_reviews.author: scotto

customer_reviews.title: Smart golashes
customer_reviews.text: I have found them to be great in deep puddles I cannot avoid. It has to be tested in the snow still. These are very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: They leak.
customer_reviews.text: They leak through the seams even though they aren’t supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: gabba

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots
customer_reviews.text: Amazing purchase! I can walk through the snow no problem and it will come right off when I stomp my feet when I want to enter the house. With these on I can slip on my sandals and shovel the driveway with no problem. I love these boots
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Sneed

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I have ever made regarding footwear
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have ever made regarding footwear!! I am a mailman and am constantly walking in all weather conditions. Even with waterproof boots my feet still end up cold and wet. After using the NEOS my feet have never been drier and warmer. I recommend these to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER RESISTANT AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: These overshoes are UTTER TRASH! Was not even remotely water resistant (let alone water proof). Ruined my shoes. A plastic bag would be more useful and better priced. BUYER BEWARE!!! I wish Amazon allowed zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mochi626

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, lightweight, and compact for travel
customer_reviews.text: These overshoes work great in the rain and to walk through puddles. They are also lightweight and fold up for packing.
customer_reviews.author: Tantor

customer_reviews.title: Still have the set I ordered brand new in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Still have the set I ordered brand new in the box. These R back-ups 4 the time when the old 1's wear-out.
customer_reviews.author: David E Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good lightweight overshoes!
customer_reviews.text: These overshoes make keeping ones feet and shoes dry very easy. Having the extended calve height keeps moisture out of your pants legs. Easy on-off for the boot, but it does make walking a little more challenging. This gets better the more you wear them. I hope they last awhile since they are not cheap to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: Also great to throw on over my tennis shoes at a ...
customer_reviews.text: I keep these in the van, I might have no snow at hone and 6 inches at work. Also great to throw on over my tennis shoes at a dog agility competition when I have to take the girls out. No need to change back and forth into a second pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Donette Gord

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials. May need the next size bigger for keen boots. Very good overshoe
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: If I could I would send them back!
customer_reviews.text: My right boot leaked! It made for a very unpleasant afternoon on iceland.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and hear nothing but good things about them. I want a pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: The sizing chart is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is totally wrong. My shoe size is 12 and therefore I got the XL that was suppose to be the proper size. I wanted it for my working boots and not even my sneaker fits.
customer_reviews.author: gregory beebe

customer_reviews.title: Great compact overshoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellant for warmth and packabilty but a little mud attacking compared top rubber boots
customer_reviews.author: Betty boop

customer_reviews.title: Great design! Sizing chart was accurate
customer_reviews.text: Great design! Sizing chart was accurate. Need to know that you have to measure the outside of the shoe/boots that you are planning on wearing with them - then the sizing is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best overshoes ever
customer_reviews.text: The best overshoes ever! I all ready have the 11" ones, but last winter in Massachusetts, they were not high enough. I have a shoe size of 11/1/2 inch and the extra large are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: use these to go in woods and feed birds, clear out trash that comes from other peoples trash in water way. Love them
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Reccommended
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty great. I've only had them for about 2 months now, but the couple times I've used them they've worked out wonderfully. Only complaint is that they don't fit as snug as I think they should. Don't get me wrong, they fit well, just not as well as this kind of boot could (maybe some laces are needed?). Still, at this price I'd recommend them to anyone looking for this sort of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mario F.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality and a great purchase. Much cheaper than in store. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Buffum

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boot to not get my feet wet, in the first 10 minutes of use my shoes were soaked, what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MEMO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and keeps the snow out. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy in and close up snug!
customer_reviews.text: The boots open wide to put your shoe in and then close easily.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E Glass

customer_reviews.title: Good overshoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Not sure the velcro holds that great, wonder if it will still work next year. edit: Year 2, and the velcro is working fine, though still a bit of a problem at times. That's the only thing keeping me from giving 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Lund

customer_reviews.title: Slight imperfections are not slight.
customer_reviews.text: One of the "slight" imperfections is actually a 3 inch tear. Boots are not as high as they look in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: ROBYN

customer_reviews.title: Solid all the way around.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and built to fit over any shoe you own. As an added bonus, you don't look like a fool wearing them. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt in Chicago

product_meta.title: NEOS 15" Adventurer All Season Waterproof Overshoes (ANN1), Black, Large
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Size:LargeFeaturing a durable 500 denier nylon upper and waterproof membrane for weather protection, these NEOS 15" Adventurer All Season Waterproof Overshoes will keep all your work boots and work shoes in top shape year after year. The Perma outsole provides excellent surface area contact on wet and slippery terrain, and it’s easy to clean off at the end of the day. The compact, ultra-lightweight design makes these slip-resistant overshoes ideal for extending the life of your work shoes, hikers and winter boots. Designed with an extra wide gusset to slide easily over any footwear, the outdoor boots feature an adjustable hook and loop strap system for a secure fit. These waterproof overshoes have a snow shoe compatible heel.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
NEOS Overshoes versatile, fortified protection makes NEOS Overshoes the preferred choice. Every NEOS Overshoe provides well-designed protection and innovative sole designs that deliver outstanding traction indoors or outdoors. Easily slid on over ordinary street shoes, these extremely lightweight overshoes protect and keep feet warm and dry. Great for rough conditions. 100 percent waterproof and windproof. Extremely lightweight and warm. Compact for convenient storage. Compatible with orthopedic and custom footwear. Constructed of durable, quality materials. Excellent traction for slip resistance. Graduated heights. Available in black color and large size.
feature_bullets: 500 Denier nylon upper and waterproof membrane protect against water and wind; extra wide opening gusset for easy on/off
Adjustable hook and loop closure system for secure, comfortable fit; snow shoe compatible heel
Slip-resistant Perma outsole for excellent traction; lightweight design helps prevent foot and leg fatigue; compact for easy storage
Optional 10 mm removable EVA insole adds comfort (sold separately)
Recommended use: construction, oil & gas, general purpose, outdoors
